name: Can You Escape Heartbreak? An Escape the Room game inspired by Undertale
name_original: Can You Escape Heartbreak? An Escape the Room game inspired by Undertale
description:
Welcome to Can You Escape Heartbreak, a new game that's the sequel to Can You Escape Fate and Can You Escape Love!

It's heavily inspired by Undertale, and is almost a parody of it (there are lots of references if you can find them!). It features a long original story, and should be a lot of fun! I've incorporated a lot of new attacks and story elements :).

I'm extremely proud of this game and the story, so I can't wait to share it with you all! The game is split into 4 episodes, and episodes are auto-saved when you beat them. Right now, only 2 episodes are released, but I will release new episodes throughout the next months!

It's also on mobile so download here for free! 

  • Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.jcsoft.canyouescapeheartbreak 
  • iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/can-you-escape-heartbreak/id1397298417?ls=1&mt=8 
  • Amazon: COMING SOON

THE STORY:

You're a love doctor who rose to fame in 2017 and has the ability to fix any heart, but can you save your own? Can You Escape Heartbreak is a fresh take on a trippy new bullethell style dodge ’em up that combines fast paced combat with point & click room escape puzzles.

Trapped with an insane yandere rooster's children, you must purge their broken hearts to escape before it’s too late. Collect mysterious clues, defend yourself against relentless bullet hell attacks from creepy skeletons and reapers, experience a heart-wrenching RPG story, and survive long enough to uncover the secrets behind your own past.

FEATURES:

  • FIGHT BULLET HELL BATTLES 
    • 3 battles with 20+ unique attacks.
  • ESCAPE THE ROOM 
    • A broken glitchy world with secrets around every corner! See your favorite 2017 Memes brought to life!
  • A LARGE WORLD TO EXPLORE 
    • 3 enemies to defeat or befriend. Who should you sacrifice and who should you save?
  • MANY ENDINGS
    •  3 Different Endings to find! 
  • GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS (mobile only)

DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR MOBILE DEVICES HERE for FREE! 

  • Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.jcsoft.canyouescapeheartbreak

Note: Look forward to new characters and more episodes and endings in future updates!

Also, let me know if you have any concerns/see any bugs! Also, if you want to make a video or anything on the game please let me know! :)

Have fun and post your records!
